```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(plotly)
```

```{r, total area}

area_by_district <- area_by_district %>%
  filter(district != "All")

total_area_plot <- ggplotly(tooltip = "text", 
         ggplot(area_by_district, aes(x = district, y = total_area_desyatin, text = total_area_desyatin)) +
  geom_col(fill = brewer.pal(length(unique(df$color)), "Set3")) +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(y = "Total area (in desyatins)", x = NULL, title = "Total land area by district for Kostroma Guberniia") 
  
```
